WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Donald Trump 's lawyer Rudy Giuliani said Sunday the president [V: might] pardon his jailed , onetime campaign chairman and others ensnared in the Russia investigation once special counsel Robert Mueller 's work wraps up , if he believed they were treated " unfairly . "
